name: Seed: Alternative Blue Coda
description: Plant this seed onto a monster in the Aden area and it will bear the fruit of the Alternative Blue Coda. For best results, a level 14-24 character must plant it on a level 14-24 monster

name: Seed: Alternative Golden Coda
description: Plant this seed onto a monster in the Aden area and it will bear the fruit of the Alternative Golden Coda. For best results, a level 17-27 character must plant it on a level 17-27 monster

name: Seed: Golden Coda
description: Plant this seed onto a monster in the Aden area and it will bear the fruit of the Golden Coda. For best results, a level 17-27 character must plant it on a level 17-27 monster

name: Spellbook - Empowering Echo
description: Spellbook needed to learn Empower of Echo. Used by Storm Screamers

name: Battle Manual - Soul Gathering
description: Battle Manual needed to learn Soul Gathering. Used by Berserkers, Arbalesters, Soul Breakers, and Inspectors.\\nRequired level: 46\0

name: White Seed of Evil Lump
description: Double-click to obtain white seed of evil

name: Black Seed of Evil Lump
description: Double-click to obtain black seed of evil

name: Enhanced Striped Scale Shirt
description: Max MP increases by 35, M. Def. increases

name: Enhanced Striped Mithril Shirt
description: Max MP increases by 70, M. Def. increases by 50

name: Enhanced Steel Bracelet
description: Activates 3 talisman slots when equipped. Increase Max MP by 60

name: Enhanced Mithril Bracelet
description: Activates 4 talisman slots when equipped. Increase Max MP by 120

name: Blessed Ring of Resurrection
description: Makes a blessed resurrection available for up to 180 minutes. Only one effect is applied, even if you wear two identical rings

name: Dynasty Leather Armor
description: Can only be worn by Arcana Lords, Elemental Masters and Spectral Masters

name: Icarus Sawsword
description: Bestows one of the following functions: Focus, Health or Light

name: Icarus Disperser
description: Bestows one of the following functions: Focus, Evasion or Crit. Damage

name: Icarus Spirit
description: Bestows one of the following functions: Acumen, Mana Up or Conversion

name: Icarus Heavy Arms
description: Bestows one of the following functions: Focus, Health or Light

name: Icarus Trident
description: Bestows one of the following functions: Anger, Critical Stun or Light

name: Icarus Hammer
description: Bestows one of the following functions: Anger, Health or Rsk. Focus

name: Icarus Hand
description: Bestows one of the following functions: Rsk. Evasion, Focus, or Haste

name: Icarus Hall
description: It can bestow one of the follow three functions, Mana Up, Conversion or Acumen

name: Icarus Spitter
description: Bestows one of the following functions: Cheap Shot, Guidance or Focus

name: Icarus Stinger
description: Kamael Exclusive Weapon: Icarus Sawsword Conversion\\nBestows one of the following functions: Focus, Health or Light.\\nWhen enchanted to 4 or more, it has a chance of increasing P. Atk., M. Atk., and healing power, and of decreaseing MP consumption for skill use for you and your party members during a critical attack

name: Icarus Wingblade
description: Kamael Exclusive Weapon: Icarus Heavy Arms Conversion\\nBestows one of the following functions: Focus, Health or Light

name: Icarus Shooter
description: Kamael Exclusive Weapon: Icarus Spitter Conversion\\nBestows one of the following functions: Cheap Shot, Guidance or Focus

name: Dynasty Platinum Plate
description: Can only be worn by Phoenix Knights, Hell Knights, Eva's Templars and Shillien Templars

name: Dynasty Platinum Plate
description: Can only be worn by Dreadnoughts, Titans, Fortune Seekers and Maestros can wear it

name: Dynasty Platinum Plate
description: Can only be worn by Duelists and Grand Khavataris

name: Dynasty Platinum Plate
description: Can only be worn by Sword Muses and Spectral Dancers

description: Can be equipped by Adventurers, Wind Riders, Ghost Hunters, and Fortune Seekers

description: Can only be worn by Sagittarius', Moonlight Sentinels, Ghost Sentinels and Tricksters

description: Can only be worn by Arcana Lords, Elemental Masters and Spectral Masters

description: Can only be worn by Archmages, Mystic Muses, Storm Screamers and Soultakers

description: Hair accessory that looks like a bird nest. Uses 2 hair accessory slots

description: Purple Viking Circlet. Uses 2 hair accessory slots

description: Golden Viking Circlet. Uses 2 hair accessory slots

description: 1st creation day commemorative adventurer hat. Uses 2 hair accessory slots. No exchange, drop, sale available \0

description: Bestows one of the following functions: Acumen, Mana Up or Conversion

description: Bestows one of the following functions: Anger, Health or Rsk. Focus

name: Alacrity Juice
description: Delicious beverage made with rare fruits. Atk. Spd. increases by 33% when used

name: Accuracy Juice
description: Delicious beverage made with rare fruits. Increases Accuracy by 4 when used

name: Critical Hit Juice
description: Delicious beverage made with rare fruits. Critical Damage increases by 35% when used

name: Critical Rate Juice
description: Delicious beverage made with rare fruits. Critical Rate increases by 30% when used

name: Casting Spd. Juice
description: Delicious beverage made with rare fruits. Casting Spd. increases by 30% when used

name: Evasion Juice
description: Delicious beverage made with rare fruits. Increases Evasion by 4 when used

name: M. Atk. Juice
description: Delicious beverage made with rare fruits. Increases M. Atk. by 75% when used

name: Power Juice
description: Delicious beverage made with rare fruits. Increases P. Atk. by 15% when used

name: Speed Juice
description: Delicious beverage made with rare fruits. Speed increases by 33 when used

name: Defense Juice
description: Delicious beverage made with rare fruits. P. Def. increases by 15% when used

name: MP Consumption Juice
description: Delicious beverage made with rare fruits. Decreases physical skill MP consumption by 10%, magic skill MP consumption by 4%, and song/dance skill MP consumption by 10%

name: Treasure Sack Piece
description: You can exchange 50 Treasure Sack Pieces for a Treasure Sack if you bring them to Snow

name: Wolf Summoning Bracelet
description: Bracelet that summons a wolf that the character can ride. Can be used for 200 minutes once equipped and cannot be exchanged or dropped

name: Transformation Scroll: Rabbit
description: A scroll that transforms you into a rabbit for 10 minutes. Locates treasure when used on Fantasy Isle. It will have no effect if used while a pet or servitor is summoned or while in a transformed state

description: Battle Manual needed to learn Warp. Used by Warders.\\nRequired level: 32\0
